entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -10.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Bay Airport 9:00 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -10.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa rising
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -11.8°C
Wind: N 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Clearing overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle early this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
